qlabel: 1 OPET_CHECK_1 - In the last working week, did you work offshore or onshore?

categories.catLabel: aSHP_1C Liquefied Petroleum Gas (LPG) or propane / Liquefied Natural Gas (LNG)
aSHP_1D They did not use any fuel (wind, electric, solar, steam)

aSHP_2C2D By open doors or windows
aSHP_2C2E No ventilation was applied to the area

aASR_1A1B1E Any asbestos-containing material from onboard a ship, train or other mobile plant
aASR_1A1B1F Lagging/insulation from boilers/ovens/furnaces or similar fixed plant
aASR_1A1B1H Road paving or asphalt containing asbestos

aASR_1A1B2D Hammering or using power tools (e.g. disc cutters, saws, etc)
